articles.title: Shell facing first UK legal claim over climate impacts of fossil fuels
articles.description: Survivors of a deadly typhoon in the Philippines have filed a claim against the UK's largest oil company.

articles.title: Friday Seacoast Roundup: York boys open in convincing fashion, more
articles.description: The York High School boys basketball team opened its season with a 31-point win at Lake Region.

articles.title: Italian luxury giant Prada buys Versace for $1.38bn
articles.description: The deal unites two major Italian fashion houses and expands Prada's line-up of brands as it seeks to compete with the LVMH group.

articles.title: China’s Lawfare Is Reshaping Sovereignty And Supply Chain Security
articles.description: China’s legal warfare in the South China Sea is reshaping the regional map—and raising global business risk.

articles.title: Fast-fashion firms Shein and Temu face calls for US investigation
articles.description: Two senior US politicians accuse the platforms of malpractice, including intellectual property theft.

articles.title: Inside The Supply Chain That Keeps Russia’s Iskander Missiles Flying
articles.description: A hidden chemical pipeline keeps Russia’s Iskander ballistic missiles in production

articles.title: Fans Loud And Loyal In Seattle Despite The Torrent Being Shut Out 3-0
articles.description: The Seattle Torrent had the on-ice portion of their historic and record setting home opener spoiled by the Minnesota Frost, who shut out the Torrent at Climate Pledge Arena.
